entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Invermere
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
